body:
Comment 11: 
@rsc

I see what you mean. We still won't be able to get to things like the
datadir of packages, though, but that's actually a general problem we
should solve even for plain Go packages, so +1.

@jimteeuwen

Yeah, as a side effect of where its output is currently used.  We should
enclose all options in single ticks to limit that further.
